byline.contributor: Nicholas Confessore reported from Henderson, and Yamiche Alcindor from Reno, Nev.
byline.original: By NICHOLAS CONFESSORE and YAMICHE ALCINDOR

abstract: Hillary Clinton attacks rival Bernie Sanders as single-issue candidate for his focus on 'Wall Street Billionaires' and campaign finance reform, one of strongest arguments he has used against her in primary race.

headline.print_headline: Shifting Attack, Clinton Calls Sanders a One-Issue Candidate
headline.main: Hillary Clinton, Shifting Line of Attack, Paints Bernie Sanders as a One-Issue Candidate

snippet: Mrs. Clinton said Senator Sanders had focused on Wall Street instead of issues that would do more to improve the lives of Americans.
lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton said Senator Sanders had focused on Wall Street instead of issues that would do more to improve the lives of Americans.
